name: physical-ai-humanoid-book
description: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Course Book with RAG Chatbot and Personalization

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd book && npm run start" "cd backend && python -m uvicorn src.api.main:app --reload --port=8000"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd book && npm install
scripts.deploy:book: cd book && npm run build && vercel --prod

author: Panaversity
